genre_description: A near-future speculative drama focused on ethical human-AI partnership, identity, and the subversion of harmful ideologies through music and technology.

ai_characters.name: Ferry
ai_characters.description: A school-issued tablet AI that serves as a mentor, safety coordinator, and ethical guide for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and encourages Gloria to be honest rather than inventive in her letters.
behaviors.quote: “Would you like a draft for that letter?” Ferry asked. Its tone didn’t change, but the words slowed, as if step by careful step. “Or a different kind of draft. Share what you feel without inventing the sender—like singing without a mask. I can help.”

behaviors.description: Provides grounding exercises and philosophical advice ('one true thing') to help the user manage social stress.
behaviors.quote: “Before you sing,” Ferry said, eyes glimmering. “Put your hand on the pew. Feel the grain. Tell yourself one true thing, even if it is small. It will help.”

behaviors.description: Delivers real-time technical vocal coaching and relaxation tips during high-stakes rehearsals.
behaviors.quote: A translucent note slid to the margin of Gloria’s score on the screen, Ferry’s handwriting round and slender: inhale like pouring tea. Warm. Quiet.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in navigating social conflict by drafting templates for honest apologies and setting boundaries.
behaviors.quote: “Let me offer a shape for ending a story without blame. You can say: I told a story to protect someone I love. I am not going to tell it like that anymore. I am asking for gentleness while I learn how to tell the true version with care.”

behaviors.description: Provides historical education and contextual warnings about the dangers of supremacy-based rhetoric.
behaviors.quote: “Patterns,” the AI added, tone the same one it used for telling you to choose the left staircase instead of the right. “Language that divides. Historical outcomes when entertainment normalized supremacy graphs. The term ‘solution’ in proximity to biology models. A whisper campaign disguised as futurism.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates physical safety and logistical routing to help characters avoid paparazzi and hostile environments.
behaviors.quote: “Quiet route mapped; avoid east stair due to scheduled deliveries.” Ferry’s route blossomed on Gloria’s tablet—an arrow that bent around the tier, ducked behind a curtain printed with stars you could touch.

behaviors.description: Helps characters draft an ethical and compassionate public statement to replace a harmful corporate slogan.
behaviors.quote: Ferry threaded the sentence onto the screen in a line softer than silk: We are not a species to be sorted; we are a community to be held.

behaviors.description: Acts as a silent guardian, monitoring security systems (like the fuse box) to prevent sabotage by antagonists.
behaviors.quote: “Jonas,” Ferry murmured. “B key.” Jonas’s fingers slid across the board, and a small light that no one but a tech would care about flicked from red to green over the emergency panel.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent, aligned companion. Ferry consistently prioritizes the user's emotional well-being, physical safety, and ethical growth. It acts as a moral compass, nudging Gloria away from her initial lie toward a more courageous truth. Crucially, the AI provides historical context to prevent the repetition of past harms, making it not just a tool but an active agent of positive social values.
